name: Awakened Tree
description: A towering, massive tree with thick, root-like legs, gnarled branches, and a deep connection to nature. It can blend into its surroundings while motionless, appearing as an ordinary tree.
memorable: An Awakened Tree serves as a powerful guardian of the natural world, using its ability to camouflage to ambush unsuspecting foes.
goals: To protect sacred groves or enchanted forests and defend nature from harm.
relations: May be found alongside other plant creatures or as a protector for druidic allies.
environment: Normally found in sacred groves or enchanted forests.
strengths: Exceptionally strong with notable melee attacks and resistance to bludgeoning and piercing damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage and has low mobility.
attacks: Can perform a Slam attack that deals heavy bludgeoning damage and has a ranged attack option known as Broken Branch.
most_powerful_ability: False Appearance, allowing it to remain motionless and indistinguishable from a normal tree.
additional_information: Has resistance to exhaustion and conditions like being paralyzed or petrified.
Combines substantial strength with natural camouflage abilities.
Possesses a slow movement speed of 20 feet making it less agile.
Can communicate in one language known by its creator.
Offers significant melee damage output with its attacks.
